sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: What is the length of each side of an equilateral triangle if its perimeter is 24 cm?
message_2:
To find the length of each side of an equilateral triangle, you can divide the perimeter by the number of sides. In this case, the perimeter is 24 cm, and there are 3 sides in an equilateral triangle.

Length of each side = Perimeter / Number of sides
Length of each side = 24 cm / 3
Length of each side = 8 cm

So, the length of each side of the equilateral triangle is 8 cm.
